name: Beach Life Guard Simulator: Coast Emergency Rescue & Life Saving Simulation Game
name_original: Beach Life Guard Simulator: Coast Emergency Rescue & Life Saving Simulation Game
description:
Sharks, Crocs attack, people get drowned and accidents like these keep happening on the coast, on the beaches where people come to have fun and enjoy life. shark attack are often, crocodile/alligators attack people and a lot of time people get drowned. as the Life Guard at beach it is your duty to help all the people and bring them to safety. Whenever you hear some voice,sound or any call for help. Use you monocular or binoculars to find the place originating that call for help, and help them at any cost, use boat or swim to help them as soon as possible.
Features:

-> Realistic beach fun environment
-> Use of binoculars to find people effected
-> Swim or boat for going to help
-> lovely simulation to learn life guard

Privacy Policy
We don't collect any personal information , any non-personal information collected by our partners like Google is used

for analytic and game improvements.
